        public void saveScores(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> strGameNum,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> strScores)

        Parameters:
        strGameNum - saves all the past game numbers into this arraylist empty arraylist
        strScores - saves all the past game scores into this arraylist empty arraylist

      • findGameScoreBinarySearch

        public boolean findGameScoreBinarySearch(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> strArray,
                                         int intLeft,
                                         int intRight,
                                         java.lang.String strInputNumFind)
        Method uses binary search in order to check whether the game the users is looking for exists and has a score
        Parameters:
        strArray - takes in the array that needs to be searched
        intLeft - in the left most value of the array which at the start will be 0
        intRight - takes in the right most value of the array which at the start will be the length of the array
        strInputNumFind - takes in the user input that is being checked in the array
        Returns:
        returns a boolean based on whether the inputed value is in the array or not

      • updateScoresFile

        Method will update the scores in the text file by writing over the current values and adding the new game
        Parameters:
        strGameNum - takes in the game number arraylist
        strScores - takes in the game score arraylist
